properties.displayName: Windows Credential Manager Access via VaultCmd
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "/listcreds:" and (FolderPath endswith "\\VaultCmd.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "VAULTCMD.EXE")

tags.name: description
tags.value: List credentials currently stored in Windows Credential Manager via the native Windows utility vaultcmd.
